== BlackBerry ==
Ubuntu users who also use a BlackBerry may not have an option for managing their BlackBerry directly from Linux.Blackberry functionality is limited to community support. There is currently no known official Linux support from RIM. <<BR>>
<code> Blackberry devices are not Ubuntu certified hardware either. If you are using a Blackberry and would like it to work in Ubuntu, let RIM know about it. </code>
